description: This Dart source file defines a custom theme for a Flutter application, specifically establishing colors, styles, and themes for UI components such as AppBar, Buttons, Input Fields, and Cards, encapsulated within the 'OceanTheme' class.

classes.name: OceanTheme
classes.description: A class providing a static getter to generate a customized ThemeData object with the Ocean Theme design elements, including color schemes, component styles, and fonts.

methods.name: oceanTheme
methods.description: A static getter that constructs and returns a ThemeData object configured with colors, component themes, and text styles for the Ocean theme.
